title: Getting a Grip on the Basics: Discover the Fundamentals of Christian Faith in 13 Sessions
description: When a child is born, doctors and family encourage the new parents to provide three elements essential to the survival of the new born: love, nourishment, and protection. These same elements are vital for every new Christian as well. This workbook will help those new to the Christian faith find these basics for survival. Getting a Grip on the Basics is a powerful study tool designed to help Christians find and experience the love of God, receive spiritual nourishment, and rest in the protective care of the Lord and His Word. Getting a Grip on the Basics will help ground new Christians in the fundamentals found in the Word of God and renew mature Christians in the basics of their faith. Here's What You'll Discover...
author: Beth A. Jones
